CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 6, 1957, pg. 18 reads: "1. Popular deejay, Bill Powell; newscaster, Russ Russell; ad sales manager, John A. Pieper, recorded voices of eager visitors for future broadcasts on Radio Station WILY."
TitMainTitle: Bill Powell, Russ Russell, and John A. Pieper in WILY AM radio station booth, in Syria Mosque for the 1957 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair
CatSubject_tab: Syria Mosque (Pittsburgh, Pa.)Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair.Advertising--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Signs--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Men--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Powell, Bill.
